mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auth_email WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND type=#{type} AND created_at BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};
mapper.update: UPDATE auth_email SET is_deleted=1, expired_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND type=#{type} AND is_deleted=0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_email(user_id, type, is_deleted, created_at, expired_at, secret) VALUES(#{userId}, #{type}, default, default, null, #{secret})
